title: Gold 3 Support - Bliz / Thresh Main - LF Duo - Jungler / ADC Needed

embed.description: Niege / Gold 3 1LP / 23W 18L Win Ratio 56% / Blitzcrank - 21W 12L Win Ratio 64%, Thresh - 2W 5L Win Ratio 29%, Fiddlesticks - 0W 1L Win Ratio 0%

body:
Still climbing, hope everyone is having a good day. Later today, i'll be pushing for Gold 2 - Gold 1, hit me up if you're interested.

Holding a 56% win rate in solo queue, start of the season, did start at 68%. 

Champion Pool: Thresh / Bliz / Pyke / Naud / Lulu / Janna / Bard / Braum 

Play Style: Usually aggressive, quite vocal, strong macro and micro, and pretty relaxed. 

Discord 
Working Microphone 
Stable Net
English Only 
No Boosters! 

Gold 3 support main, looking for duo - Jungler / ADC for solo queue. 

IGN: Niege 
OP.GG: https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=niege 
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/niege
